card.name: Timeless Heartwood
card.text: When Timeless Heartwood enters the battlefield, search your library for a card named Heart of the Sea or a card named Soul of Fire, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on top of your library. Tap artifacts you control named Eternity's Horizon, Heart of the Sea, Bones of the Earth, Soul of Fire, and Timeless Heartwood: Target player loses the game.

card.name: Scholar of Harbaz
card.text: When Scholar of Harbaz enters the battlefield, it studies. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)

card.name: Ritual of Honey
card.text: Arbitrate. (You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.) Draw a card.

card.name: Judgment AKI
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each judgment counter you have, choose one — • [b]Penance [/b]— You lose 1 life. • [b]Tithe [/b]— Target opponent creates a tapped Treasure token. You lose a judgment counter.

card.name: Emperor's Hand
card.text: Whenever Emperor's Hand deals combat damage to an opponent, that player gets that many judgment counters. (At the beginning of a player's upkeep, for each judgment counter, they choose one—Lose 1 life, or lose a judgment counter and choose an opponent to create a Treasure token.)

card.name: Dakazhi Judge
card.text: When Dakazhi Judge enters the battlefield, each player gets a judgment counter. (At the beginning of a player's upkeep, for each judgment counter, they choose one—Lose 1 life, or lose a judgment counter and choose an opponent to create a Treasure token.) {1}{U}{B}, {T}: Arbitrate. (You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)

card.name: Prince's Tutor
card.text: When Prince's Tutor enters the battlefield, it studies. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.) Whenever another creature you control studies, put a +1/+1 counter on Prince's Tutor.

card.name: Capital Decree
card.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller gets a judgment counter. (At the beginning of a player's upkeep, for each judgment counter, they choose one—Lose 1 life, or lose a judgment counter and choose an opponent to create a Treasure token.)

card.name: Patronage of the Arts
card.text: Sculptures you control get +1/+1. Engrave 3—{3}{U}{R} (If you cast this spell for {3}{U}{R}, when it enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)

card.name: Ancient Etchings
card.text: Engrave 3—{3}{B}{G} (If you cast this spell for {3}{B}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.) Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain haste and menace until end of turn.

card.name: Architect of Wonders
card.text: Spells you cast for their engrave cost and artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: AKI Draft Archetypes AKI
card.text: {W}{U} JUDGMENT TAPOUT Cast judgment upon your foes with strong control effects. {U}{B} ARBITRATE Move judgment and +1/+1 counters, and justice is yours to decide. {B}{R} SPELLSLINGER Cast noncreature spells to boost your board presence. {R}{G} STUDY Your creatures can research new spells or grow stronger. {G}{W} SACRIFICE Your loss is no one's gain. Sacrifice creatures and Treasures for profit. {W}{B} JUDGMENT CONTROL Wait patiently to pass judgment upon the enemy. {B}{G} +1/+1 COUNTERS Grow your creatures through study and engraving. {G}{U} ARTIFACTS Build monuments and engrave your legacy with artifact spells. {U}{R} SCULPTURES The living statuary of Akaddi is yours to command. {R}{W} HARMONY Attack with both artifact and nonartifact creatures for bonuses.

card.name: Empire's End
card.text: Each player exiles all nonland permanent cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all nonland permanents they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Assemble the Relics
card.text: Choose one — • Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • Reveal an artifact card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

card.name: Screaming Prophet

card.text: Destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target land. Each player who controlled a permanent destroyed this way may search their library for a permanent card that shares a type with it, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Ancient Judge
card.text: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Arbitrate. (You may remove a counter from target player. If you do, another target player gets a counter of the same kind. Repeat this process for creatures, then for noncreature permanents.)

card.name: Wild Inspiration
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token and put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is that spell's mana value.

card.name: Stoic Watcher
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever a creatures enters the battlefield, if its power is greater than Stoic Watcher's, put a +1/+1 counter on Stoic Watcher. Whenever a creature dies, if its toughness is greater than Stoic Watcher's, put a +1/+1 counter on Stoic Watcher.

card.name: Winged Justice
card.text: Haste Whenever you attack with an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Herald of the Old Ways
card.text: {X}, {T}, Sacrifice Herald of the Old Ways: Search your library for a Lammasu, Manticore, Nephilim, or Sphinx card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If X is 6 or more, create a token that's a copy of that card.

card.name: Ominous Obelisk
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Put a charge counter on Ominous Obelisk. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Ominous Obelisk: Add {C} for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Tomb of the Forgotten
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}: Put a charge counter on Tomb of the Forgotten. Then if Tomb of the Forgotten has ten or more charge counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create ten 2/2 black Horror creature tokens.

card.name: Qamesh, Ardent Justicar
card.text: As Qamesh, Ardent Justicar enters the battlefield, choose law or order. • Law — Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast. • Order — Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Eldritch Echo
card.text: When you cast your next spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Decadent Barge
card.text: Whenever Decadent Barge enters the battlefield or attacks, exile the top two cards of each opponent's library. Decadent Barge's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards exiled with it. Crew 3

card.name: Graven Ideal
card.text: Graven Ideal deals X damage to any target. Engrave X—{X}{X}{R} (If you cast this spell for {X}{X}{R}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute X +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.)

card.name: Stoic Stylite
card.text: Trample Whenever Stoic Stylite deals combat damage to an opponent, it studies. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a noncreature, nonland card. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card on the top or bottom of your library.)

card.name: Proud Contender
card.text: When Proud Contender dies, exile it. If you do, create a white enchantment token named Proud Memories with "Creatures you control get +1/+1."

card.name: Anointed Scarab
card.text: Flying When Anointed Scarab dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, return each other creature with mana value X or less to its owner's hand.

card.name: Beginning of the End
card.text: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of permanents put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Barkhan Hellkite
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Barkhan Hellkite gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

card.name: Idyllic Pools
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, search your library for a permanent card with the same mana cost as that card plus an additional {1}, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. (Mana cost includes color. For example, if you sacrifice a permanent with mana cost {2}{W}{B}, search for a permanent with mana cost {3}{W}{B}.)

card.name: Epic of Strength
card.text: Engrave 3—{5}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for {5}{G}{G}, create a 0/0 Sculpture artifact creature token, then distribute three +1/+1 counters among Sculptures you control.) Double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

card.name: Proud Memories AKI
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
